snippet.title: Legendary Creatures 2 Launches on October 17!
snippet.description:
Legendary Creatures 2 is coming to Steam on October 17!
⚔️Play the demo NOW on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2233790/Legendary_Creatures_2
✅Follow the dev on Twitter: https://twitter.com/HideChara1
✅Join the Discord: https://discord.gg/r8GkE9Ea

Legend Creatures 2 invites you into an immersive open-world adventure, where unending possibilities await. Explore different landscapes, recruit creatures of legend, and wield their powers as you embark on an epic quest to conquer the formidable demon lord.

Game Features:

- Unleash your adventurous spirit on a randomly generated map, brimming with threats and surprises.
- Create unique skill combinations from a diverse pool, thanks to the main and sub-class system.
- Dive into the equipment system and upgrade gear with gems that offer a variety of effects.
- Unlock new map facilities as you conquer each difficulty level, ensuring fresh challenges.
- Discover a plethora of creatures, skills, items, and facilities.
- Modding support will be implemented into the game later, simple and flexible just like Legend Creatures 1.
#indiegames #roguelike #autobattler
